description: This sticky eggplant stew is simple to make and so tasty, great for meat-free Monday.
name: Miso Eggplant Stew Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Place the eggplant cubes on a large baking tray, drizzle with oil and roast for 25 minutes, turning halfway through.
Whisk the miso paste in a medium bowl with the soy sauce, maple syrup and lime juice.

Heat the remaining oil in a pan on medium high heat, tip in the roasted eggplant and pour over the miso mix. Add 4 tablespoons of water to loosen and cook for 4-5 minutes, stirring, until sticky and reduced.
Serve with chopped coriander and rice or noodles.
